overview: Chuck decides to make an honest woman of his long-time live-in partner Carissa by marrying her. But marriage does not seem to agree with them for they are now headed for a divorce. Chuck is seeing his colleague Betsy while Carissa is spending a lot of her time in David's apartment.
tagline: Together for the first time to ignite your screens!
title: Palipat-lipat, Papalit-palit
